titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to make the research credit permanent and to allow such credit for expenses attributable to certain collaborative research consortia.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 10/19/1995--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to make permanent the credit for increasing research activities and to allow such a credit for qualified consortia expenses attributable to certain collaborative research consortia. Provides for a reduction for amounts expended on ineligible research.
